channel.title: [Pi] Special Attacks [Pi]
channel.description: Alright guys, this seems like it should be an extremely easy fix but I cannot get my dragon claw spec to hit x4 on players. It works perfectly on NPC's but still will only hit x2 on other players. Is there a simple common fix to this problem? Please do not just say "google it" or something like that. I just got done adding the special attack and I was pretty sure I added all the necessary parts. Any ideas on where I could have missed something or messed up?

item.title: [Pi] Special Attacks [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Make sure the double hit variable is actually being turned true when the player is wearing the claws.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Special Attacks [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

sk8rdude461:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/381791-pi-d-claws-4-hit-special-pi.html

I have all of that EXACTLY like the tutorial and the spec still doesn’t work on Players.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Special Attacks [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Alright guys, this seems like it should be an extremely easy fix but I cannot get my dragon claw spec to hit x4 on players. It works perfectly on NPC’s but still will only hit x2 on other players. Is there a simple common fix to this problem? Please do not just say “google it” or something like that. I just got done adding the special attack and I was pretty sure I added all the necessary parts. Any ideas on where I could have missed something or messed up?

Read full topic
